revision.text:

|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer T4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = U |revision = v3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 23, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_T4U_v3 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1300 |series = Archer T |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle (w/ large antenna)
|vendor_id = 2357 |device_id = 0115 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TE7T4UV3 |icid = 8853A-T4UV3 |boardid = 2052500614 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BU;RTL8812BU, H2C53P2, GH07; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = 400 |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = https://linuxwiki.de/LinuxWireless#Tp-Link_AC1300_Archer_T4U_V3 |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = 5GHz Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85734-11;5734, 2949;2; |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, high-gain, flip-up antenna, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/08/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2052500614" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{seealso|TP-LINK Archer T series}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu/commit/5630b13e1076aeec410ad184f97f4cdf8bf8ddb8 ''Added support for TP-Link Archer T4U V3''] - [https://github.com/MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu rtl8822bu] driver ([https://linuxwiki.de/LinuxWireless#Tp-Link_AC1300_Archer_T4U_V3 rtl8812bu])
